amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce nuclear energy research and development activities by $514,391,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the construction and expansion account of nuclear energy by $514,391,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 281 (Roll no. 315).
